item.description:
**  Please note time change to 7-9 pm

 

I am so looking forward to being in community with all of you again!  Please join us Saturday, April 7th in our usual space in Watertown Square. 

 

We will celebrate, in our own Tantric way, the season of RENEWAL and REBIRTH. 

 

A Tantra Community Gathering is a sacred space for us to connect with ourselves and each other.  There will be opportunities to breathe and get back into your body; to chant and re-harmonize your chakras; to practice Tantra Yoga and open up spaces and places in your body that are holding you back, keeping you small and not allowing you to experience ALL THERE IS to experience.  

 

 

Please bring a loving, juicy, sexy, sensuous, sacred poem to share and something delectable to eat as well. 

 

With great love and affection!

Pushana 

 

p.s.  Please pay in advance to receive the price of $20.  Using PayPal, you can send money to my email address:  pushana@gmail.com.
item.name: Tantra Community Gathering - Celebrating Renewal
